basics.name: Dmitry V
basics.label: Staff Site Reliability Engineer
basics.summary: Staff SRE with 10+ years building reliable infrastructure across adtech, travel, and hardware lifecycle management. At IPonWeb, reduced company-wide daily alerts from 200 to under 10 while processing millions of transactions per minute. At Booking.com, led reliability for the largest revenue-generating department and grew a team from 2 to 7 engineers. Specialize in incident management process design, toil reduction, and making on-call sustainable. Comfortable operating in high-ambiguity environments where goals need to be discovered, not just executed. Active open-source contributor with focus on simple, readable Go code.

work.name: Booking.com
work.position: Senior Site Reliability Engineer, ABU Reliability
work.summary: Led reliability for the Accommodations Business Unit, Booking.com's largest revenue-generating department handling core customer and partner-facing services.
highlights: Grew SRE team from 2 to 7 engineers; established processes for incident response, on-call rotations, and cross-team collaboration.
Ranked consistently in top 5 Puppet contributors company-wide through weekly improvements to infrastructure code.
Conducted 100+ technical interviews in 2022; iterated on interview process based on candidate and panel feedback.
Participated in on-call rotations at team, department, and company-wide levels for critical production systems.
Drove engineering promotions process improvements; ran peer case review groups with dozens of participants.

Built trust with customer team through hands-on technical work, then transitioned project to permanent ownership.
